extendedInfo.description: SeaBattle Live, another great multiplayer game for Android brought to you by Dragonplayâ¢, the creators of the mega hit poker game, Live Holdâem.  SeaBattle Live is an online game based on the classic pencil and paper(Battleship). Play live against your friends or a random online opponent and win the battle by destroying your opponent ships before he discovers and sinks your fleet. Features:OPPONENTSâ Challenge your friends over the Internetâ Find new opponents online in no timeâ Post your scores to the global online leader boardâ Live Chat with other players - Cool avatars and in game virtual goods for a great social expirianceâ Intuitive and elegant user interface especially designed for Android tablets and phones â Enjoy a user interface that was specifically designed for daily commuters- SeaBattle Live supports Android devices running 1.5 or later- Register with your Facebook connect or Guest accountProceeding with this installation confirms that you agree to abide by our terms and conditions as stated on our website http://m.dragonplay.com/SeaBattle/Terms.aspx

reviews.title: Wonderful game
reviews.comment: Great game, good design, perfect way to male battleship for the  android market. Great people too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: candyman111
reviews.comment: its an awsome game and has to be one of the best out there!!! i really recommend this game its easy and very addictive!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t play without paying
reviews.comment: Stupid app, doesn\'t give me any coins, then tells me I need to buy coins to play. Haven\'t even gotten to play a single game. Can\'t find friends without logging in to fb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Instant classic.
reviews.comment: Love this game. Always fun, no problems -at first there was but it was solved by reinstalling. ALSO note great that it auto saves to SD card, well done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So great
reviews.comment: I\'m in love with this game its AWESOME, incredibly addictive and a hella lot more fun than the Texas Hold\'em app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: You won\'t regret!
reviews.comment: I play it every spare time now... It is so challanging to get the highest rank!!! 4 stars cuz the turns limit is too short for teasing each other with the chat... However, this is a really great game!!!
reviews.author: Robert Yunus

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: This game is super fun, but I do agree with the last guy, being able to see my stats would be pretty cool, but overall freakin awesome, very addictive game, recommend to all!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: So good I luv it... its so good and cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Pretty good game. Definitely fun..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lol
reviews.comment: Why when I make a come back and have a chance to win, people quit and I don\'t get any of the coins??? Cheaters and quitters!! That\'s that shyt I don\'t like  #unstalling
reviews.author: Toni Thompson

reviews.title: Battle on!!!
reviews.comment: This is a great game. I could play it all day, I think I will. :-)
reviews.author: Harry Deeck

reviews.title: Trinidad!
reviews.comment: Keeps me at the edge of my seat knowing the game can go in any direction. Love hw u can chat while playin & add a profile pic. I\'m sure there is room for improvement as any other game. But i\'m satisfied! What about when the game is over, showing the positions of ure opponant. Especially if you lost. Would make u wish ure strategy was different.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Suks!
reviews.comment: It would be great if when ur playing, the opponent doesn\'t take to long and then somehow ur fired a shot without pushing anything. Seems to have a mind of it\'s own. Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive fun
reviews.comment: This is a really great game with a twist fron the original peg games. We used to go turn fir turn on the pegs, in this if you score a hit you keep firing. Only othwr diwnside is you can\'t rotate yout peices either. I can brush those two things aside tho and say this is STILL an awesome online version if battleship!
reviews.author: jason borso

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Over all great game. Is a time consumer. Has close unexpectedly several times. For that it lost one star.
reviews.author: Dawn Hopenwasser

reviews.title: What happened
reviews.comment: Used to get daily bonuses for logging in. All I get now is the option to buy coins. Garbage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: What a great game play all your freinds online aswell. MUST DOWNLOAD. Or snooze ya loose! Lol!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: keeps redirecting me to fbk then it goes blank, I uninstalled and uninstalled and the same thing happened. How can I fix it? HELLOOO!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t add friends
reviews.comment: Nice to play solo but adding friends is a nightmare. Both connected through Facebook and now buddies appear. With bluetooth,  we get a file with an invite to download the game. After download, nothing. General FAQ online that only gives you a general answer but doesn\'t troubleshoot. Don\'t download when you want to play together, doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cant register, have 2 play as a guest Says Im registered thru FBK yet says I haven\'t completed registration My friends have same prob Wud be fun but that makes ur app a zero
reviews.author: A Google User
